reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: The U.S. President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief – PEPFAR (Global Health and Child Survival - GHCS). All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in Cameroon. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.. The U.S. President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief – PEPFAR (Global Health Programs - GHP) aiming to reach sustainable control of the HIV/AIDS epidemic

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: U.S. engagement in Cameroon seeks to advance regional peace while encouraging development by strengthening healthcare systems. Foreign assistance contributes towards achieving these objectives by implementing programs that seek to strengthen the national response to the HIV/AIDS pandemic and increase the professionalism and effectiveness of Cameroon's military forces.

All headquarters and overseas costs associated with the medical support of Volunteers. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.
